data.meanings: To live long, enjoy a thing.
data.sentence: The word وَأُمْلِي comes from the root م ل و and is associated with the meanings: To live long, enjoy a thing.

data.meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Dal) To be about to, be just on the point of, be well nigh, intend, wish.
data.sentence: The word كَيْدِي comes from the root ك ي د and is associated with the meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Dal) To be about to, be just on the point of, be well nigh, intend, wish.

data.meanings: To render/make a thing firm/strong/stout/hard, season skin (with rob or inspissated juice), well seasoned, possess any quality in a strong degree, more sweet.
data.sentence: The word مَتِينٌ comes from the root م ت ن and is associated with the meanings: To render/make a thing firm/strong/stout/hard, season skin (with rob or inspissated juice), well seasoned, possess any quality in a strong degree, more sweet.
